      • Bomb

        public Bomb(processing.core.PImage img,
            int xLoc,
            int yLoc)
        makes a bomb
        Parameters:
        img - the image used for drawing the bomb
        xLoc - the x location of the bomb's top left corner
        yLoc - the y location of the bomb's top left corner
